where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF(QUERY(sr <* shape_representation | (sr\representation.name = 'mating connector placement') AND (SIZEOF(QUERY(p <* sr.items | ('ASSEMBLY_PHYSICAL_INTERFACE_REQUIREMENT_MIM.' + 'PLACEMENT' IN TYPEOF(p)) AND (p\representation_item.name = 'connector placement'))) = 0))) = 0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF(QUERY(shuo <* specified_higher_usage_occurrence | NOT(SIZEOF(QUERY(pd <* USEDIN(shuo, 'ASSEMBLY_PHYSICAL_INTERFACE_REQUIREMENT_MIM.' + 'PROPERTY_DEFINITION.DEFINITION') | NOT(SIZEOF(QUERY(pdr <* USEDIN(pd, 'ASSEMBLY_PHYSICAL_INTERFACE_REQUIREMENT_MIM.' + 'PROPERTY_DEFINITION_REPRESENTATION.DEFINITION') | ('ASSEMBLY_PHYSICAL_INTERFACE_REQUIREMENT_MIM.' + 'SHAPE_REPRESENTATION' IN TYPEOF(pdr.used_representation)) AND (pdr.used_representation\representation.name = '3d bound volume shape'))) = 0) )) = 0) )) = 0
